about_the_game:
Casino Tycoon is a first-person simulation where you take on the role of a casino manager.

Start by buying a few slot machines and operating as a cashier. Then quickly expand your establishment by renting additional floors or buying new buildings.

Manage the day-to-day

Hire honest dealers or recruit crooks to deal cards in your casino games. Crooks will make customers lose more often but may get caught and bring a bad reputation to your casino.

Buy slot machines and change their odds and jackpot amounts. Odds too high? Your casino will lose money. Jackpot too low? Customers will play for shorter periods. Find the perfect balance to maximize profit.

Expand your business

Acquire licenses to unlock new games for your casino. Poker, dice, and roulette games will be available as you expand. Order alcoholic beverages and snacks to keep your guests entertained. Manage expenses, bills, and purchases from an in-game computer.

Reinvest your well-earned profit in expanding your business, but don't forget to pay the "elders" who own you.
